record.title: PROVIDING THAT THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE INTER-AMERICAN DEVELOPMENT BANK OR THE ALTERNATE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR OF THE INTER-AMERICAN DEVELOPMENT BANK MAY SERVE ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE INTER-AMERICAN FOUNDATION

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent we now proceed to Calendar No. 75, S. 676.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the bill.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent the bill be read three times and passed, the motion to reconsider be laid on the table, and any statements be printed in the Record.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
